BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISCMM_AGENDA_FILE_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_COMM_ID, STR_AGENDA_SEQ_NO, STR_BRIEF_DESC, STR_PRIORITY_LEVEL, DT_DATE_RECEIVED, NUM_DEPT_CODE, STR_REM_OF_DIR, STR_AGENDA_F_NAME,GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PISCMM_AGENDA_FILE_TRN T SET T.NUM_COMM_ID=?, T.STR_BRIEF_DESC=?, T.STR_PRIORITY_LEVEL=?, T.DT_DATE_RECEIVED=?, T.NUM_DEPT_CODE=?,T.STR_REM_OF_DIR=?,T.STR_AGENDA_F_NAME=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.STR_AGENDA_SEQ_NO=? and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISCMM_AGENDA_FILE_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_AGENDA_SEQ_NO=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
